job_tasks.phrase: Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation of applications using software development practices and tools.

job_tasks.phrase: Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development and improvement of backend systems, specifically mentioning cloud technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.
job_tasks.justification: Code review is a fundamental part of the software development lifecycle, ensuring quality and standards.

soft_skills.phrase: What you will NOT be doing: Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.
What you will NOT be doing: Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.
What you will NOT be doing: Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses on modern web app and backend development using cloud patterns, with a mention of AWS. It lacks any specific mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related tasks required for ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles.
